column5:
1.Reduced threat detection time from hours to minutes; reduction in false positives; Prevented potential losses from cyber attacks; Enhanced regulatory compliance and risk management; Improved security team efficiency.

2.  Security AI - Remediation Operations, Security & Compliance as Code i.e. Use of AI to enable fast, consistent and scalable remediation of security defects, vulnerabilities and configuration issues in an efficient and frictionless manner using Ai assisted security policy and compliance as code with the goal of enabling the bank to deliver secure, quality, compliant and reliable code, data and infrastructure. Notable benefits will include but not limited to:
Increase in efficiencies around the delivery of quality, secure and compliant code.
Enhance Developer experience through the reduction of Toil(Security Defects & Vulnerability Fixing) by x%.
Reduction of production vulnerabilities by Y% due to early detection and remediation of defects before production
Increased and continuous assurance in terms of meeting our regulatory and CHF requirements - Evergreen builds.
etc.

column9:
1) Require Uplift in Security Observability & Operational Observability.
2) Next Generation SIEM and SOAR uplift is required as a foundational enabler
3. Strong foundations and getting the basics right for Threat Intelligence is key. Current capabilities are immature and not fit for purpose.
4. Investments in enabling orchestration of standardised patterns for detection and response logic across all the key areas is a must invest in (Application, Cloud, Data, Integration, Endpoint & Networking) 
5) Simplification and uplift of the Engineering Automation, Infrastructure Foundations pipelines is key to delivering outcomes
6) DevOps Operating Model (Enterprise Level)
7. Transformation and overhaul of the current vulnerability management model.

K. Also Requires close collaboration to drive consistent uplift and modernisation across all parties involved in the devlivey of software, data and infra through the various delivery pipelines. column10:
Huge impact as it will change the way we develop software for our 500+ domain teams.  We don't see software designs at TAF at the moment - usually just infrastructure ones.  We need a lift up in practices around software designs including things like state flows and sequence diagrams to inform GenAI in the creation of code and unit test practices.  Expect significant change to domain team and developer workflows out of this.
